des:
"This is a great, quick mocha treat that is great for the holidays! 

Hope you enjoy!"
ins: Stir hot water, sugar, and instant coffee together in a bowl until sugar and coffee are dissolved. Add milk, chocolate syrup, and vanilla extract; mix well. Chill in refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight. Stir ice cream into punch before serving.
